price: Akasema: Mola wetu Mlezi ni yule aliye kipa kila kitu umbo lake, kisha akakiongoa.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
